DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine MEDI4736 adequately tolerate combination tremelimumab subject advance non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1b Study MEDI4736 Combination With Tremelimumab Subjects With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , open-label , dose-escalation , dose expansion study MEDI4736 combination tremelimumab evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetic ( PK ) , immunogenicity , antitumor activity MEDI4736 combination tremelimumab adult subject advance NSCLC .

Any concurrent chemotherapy , immunotherapy , biologic , hormonal therapy cancer treatment 2 . Current prior use immunosuppressive medication within 14 day first dose study drug 3 .
